articles.description: The non-compete clause under contention says that after resigning, an Infosys employee cannot work, for a period of six months, with one of the named rival companies on a client he or she would have serviced in the preceding 12 months before quitting.

articles.title: As SUV race heats up, has Maruti Suzuki fallen far behind the curve? - Economic Times
articles.description: Given the raw material price pressure, analysts expect the company to report flattish margins in the March quarter. Centrum Broking in its projection said Ebitda margin will likely be around 8.4 per cent, lowest among its listed peers.
